exportedPipeline.description:
The pipeline allows you to move all your logs from your machine to a GCS bucket.
The machine can either be on an EC2 instance (hosted on AWS) or a compute engine (hosted on GCP).   
You will need to create at least one key/value pair in your vault and two if you want to use ec2 -> gcs sync:
- One for GCP service account.
- One for AWS ec2 instance pem (only if you want to use ec2 -> gcs sync).
